description:
Lin`s bravery in the face of certain death inspires courage within the villagers, who mount a resistance against the assault squadron.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jigoku kara no Yobigoe! Rei Omae wa Shichousei o Mitaka!!
Voices from Hell! Rei, Did You See the Death Omen Star?
地獄からの呼び声! レイお前は死兆星を見たか!!
